name: Kyeltziv Rangefinders
desc: Advanced rangefinding systems are mounted on this vessel increasing the range of ballistic weaponry by 100. However these rangefinders suffer interference from flux buildup reducing this bonus as flux levels increase. The weapon range bonus drops off completely at full flux.

name: Kyeltziv Rangefinders (fighter)
desc: Advanced rangefinding systems are mounted on this vessel increasing the range of ballistic weaponry by %s. However these rangefinders suffer interference from flux buildup reducing this bonus as flux levels increase. The weapon range bonus drops off completely at full flux.

name: Kyeltziv Rangefinders
desc: Ballistic range plus 45%, Energy Range plus 25%, bonus lowers as flux levels increase, drops off completely at full flux. [For Suojus]

name: Kyetlziv Visible Fighter Weapons
desc: Multiplies weapon health by %s, and increases weapon repair rate by %s, SPECIAL HIDDEN MOD INTENDED FOR FIGHTERS ONLY.

name: Interceptor Corvette Core
desc: Gives all point-defense weapons the ability to identify - and ignore - decoy flares. In addition, all point-defense weapons get the best possible target leading, and all damage to missiles and fighters is increased by %s.

name: Assault Corvette Core
desc: Increases damage dealt to target weapons by %s, When below %s hull regenerates up to %s hull per second.

name: Strike Corvette Core
desc: Increases weapon hitstrength and damage dealt to shields by %s.

name: Support Corvette Core
desc: Increases energy weapon ammunition capacity by %s, increases energy weapon ammunition regeneration by %s, and increases energy weapon damage by %s.

name: Kyeltziv Flux Grid Tuning
desc:
Kyeltziv engineers have employed proprietary tuning to this vessels flux grid to allow it to normalize more efficiently from heightened flux levels.
This ship gains a flux dissipation bonus that scales with the current flux level, gaining the full bonus when at or above %s flux capacity. The increase is up to %s/%s/%s/%s, depending on hull size.
Due to the sensitivity of the tuning the ship will also take %s increased EMP damage.

name: Kyeltziv Package Slot
desc: Hidden hullmod that allows the ship to Have Seggs (mount Kyeltziv Customisation Packages)

name: Kyeltziv Assault Package
desc: <Snake, remember the basics of CQC.>
short: Optimises ships ability to engage in short ranged combat.

name: Kyeltziv Siege Package
desc: <Snipin's a good job, mate>
short: Optimises ship for extreme range combat.

name: Kyeltziv Support Package
desc: <Tools of the trade!>
short: Optimises ship for a defensive support role.

name: Kyeltziv Assault Loader
desc: <Snake, remember the basics of CQC.>
short: Improves ballistic weapons rapid fire capabilities.

name: Kyeltziv Siege Loader
desc: <Snipin's a good job, mate>
short: Improves ballistic weapons long range capabilities.

name: Kyeltziv Autoforge Loader
desc: <Tools of the trade!>
short: Improves ship autoforge to increase drone replenishment and improve missile performance.

name: Variable Weapon Booster System
desc: <Squared away, sir!>

name: Flux-Phase Ammo Feed
desc: <One more for the landfill!>
short: Increases ballistic fire rate, but reduces missile fire rate.

name: Parallel Nanoforge Processing
desc: This vessel's nanoforge has been optimised to support a smaller number of LPCs than is typically standard. This setup enables for parallel processing of fabrication, resulting in a %s reduction in strikecraft replacement time.
short: Reduces time to replace lost fighters.

name: Dedicated FCS
desc: The Fire Control System and overall weapon control configuration of this vessel is specialised for targeting Fighters and Missiles. As a result all weapons mounted on this ship will deal %s less damage to ships and generate %s less Flux when fired.
short: Reduces damage to ships, reduces weapon flux cost.

name: Parallel Nanoforge Processing (Station)
desc:
This vessel's nanoforge has been optimised to support a smaller number of LPCs than is typically standard. This setup enables for parallel processing of fabrication, resulting in a %s reduction in strikecraft replacement time. Fighters from this craft also deal %s increased damage.
Kyeltziv Stations benefit from the ability to field truly superior strikecraft, but in exchange can only field a relatively limited number of wings.
short: Reduces time to replace lost fighters, and increases Fighter damage.

name: Stealth Minefield (Shock)
desc: Shock Mines attack enemy ships during battle.
short: Shock Mines attack enemy ships during battle.

name: Parallel Nanoforge Processing (Remnant)
desc: This vessel's nanoforge has been optimised to support a smaller number of LPCs than is typically standard. This setup enables for parallel processing of fabrication, resulting in a %s reduction in strikecraft replacement time.
short: Reduces time for the droneship to replace lost fighters.

name: Drone Platform
desc: Multiplies weapon health by %s, and increases weapon repair rate by %s, And more! SPECIAL HIDDEN MOD INTENDED FOR THE KOHTA DRONE PLATFORM ONLY.

name: Linnake Gun Platform
desc: [Linnake Gun Platform Information Hullmod]

name: Gun Platform (Base)
desc: Multiplies weapon health by %s, and increases weapon repair rate by %s, And more! SPECIAL HIDDEN MOD INTENDED FOR THE PROCHNYI'S GUN PLATFORM ONLY. [DEFAULT MODE]

name: Gun Platform (Assault)
desc: Multiplies weapon health by %s, and increases weapon repair rate by %s, And more! SPECIAL HIDDEN MOD INTENDED FOR THE PROCHNYI'S GUN PLATFORM ONLY. [ASSAULT MODE]

name: Gun Platform (Siege)
desc: Multiplies weapon health by %s, and increases weapon repair rate by %s, And more! SPECIAL HIDDEN MOD INTENDED FOR THE PROCHNYI'S GUN PLATFORM ONLY. [SIEGE MODE]

name: Gun Platform (Support)
desc: Multiplies weapon health by %s, and increases weapon repair rate by %s, And more! SPECIAL HIDDEN MOD INTENDED FOR THE PROCHNYI'S GUN PLATFORM ONLY. [SUPPORT MODE]

name: Pirate Assault Conversion
desc: <This will be messy.>

name: Infernium Pulse Effect
desc: HIDDEN HULLMOD, makes the system do the "impulse dash"
short: HIDDEN HULLMOD, makes the system do the "impulse dash"

name: Flux-Phase Accelerator
desc: <Time for an ambush!>

name: Hazardous Environment Suite
desc: <High-impact reactive armor activated.>
short: Resitance to kinetic damage, and slow passive armour regen.

name: Flux-Phase Shunt
desc: <Mean, green, and unseen.>
short: Soft to Hard conversion on system usage, better venting.
